attributes.action: Bring back our weekly refuse collections.
attributes.additional_details:
Now EU wants bins collected monthly! New edict to help Britain hit recycling target
 Bin collection could be cut to once a month to meet EU recycling targets
 New study on recycling rates will be presented to ministers next week
 Research suggests recycling rate has 'stagnated' in recent years


Read more: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3233186/Now-EU-wants-bins-collected-monthly-New-edict-help-Britain-hit-recycling-target.html#ixzz3lh4njDPe 
Follow us: @MailOnline on Twitter | DailyMail on Facebook
attributes.background: We are entitled to weekly refuse collections as we pay for it within our council tax.Europeans get daily collections, we get fortnightly collections.Why?

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106488

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
